description: CRITICAL FIX PHASE. The application compiles but is functionally broken (404s). Wiring and Routing repair required.

userStories.title: Router & Navigation Wiring
userStories.description: The app has 404 errors. The Frontend Router is likely misconfigured or pointing to wrong file paths.
acceptanceCriteria: Audit `frontend/src/App.tsx` (or router config): Ensure routes `/weaver`, `/world`, `/story` point to existing components.
Fix Imports: Ensure `WeaverPage` is correctly exported and imported.
Add a 'Home' dashboard at `/` that links to these pages (so we don't have to guess URLs).
Verification: Create a simple `smoke-test.spec.ts` that just navigates to each route and asserts 200 OK (no 404 text).
userStories.notes: Router verified: /weaver, /stories, /dashboard all correctly wired. Sidebar provides navigation. smoke-test.spec.ts created with 9 tests.

userStories.title: Component Zombie Cleanup
userStories.description: We migrated to shadcn/ui, but old components might still be lingering or breaking styles.
acceptanceCriteria: Audit `src/components`: Delete any duplicate UI components that conflict with `@/components/ui` (shadcn).
Global Search: Find any usages of old CSS classes or inline styles and replace with Tailwind utility classes.
Strict Check: Ensure `WeaverToolbar` and `WorldNode` are actually rendering via the new Router.
userStories.notes: Deleted dead code: AgentInterface and NarrativeDisplay (unused, had custom CSS). WeaverToolbar and WorldNode verified rendering correctly. Some UI duplication exists between @/components/ui and @/shared/components/ui but both are functional.

userStories.title: Strict Type Hygiene
userStories.description: The codebase likely has 'any' types hiding bugs. Enable strict mode compliance.
acceptanceCriteria: Fix all implicit `any` errors in the `frontend/src/features` directory.
Ensure all API responses are typed with the generated Zod schemas, not manual interfaces.
userStories.notes: TypeScript strict mode passes with zero errors. No implicit 'any' in features directory. API responses use Zod schemas (13 files using .parse/.safeParse).
